Text.Page:
Please, help me! My son wandered off. I fear he's trying his hand at hunting.

Shalim's heart is huge, but he's no match for a bear or barsicore, to say nothing of the other dangers out here.

Could you help me find him? He's got a thing about hero worship. If you prove your strength, he'll gladly follow you.

Go back to my father? Hah! He'd never send someone like you after me. He's a great hunter. You're...well, not.

Why is that vein bulging on your forehead? Look, if you can kill a {@LinkCreature:34#910#frostguard mugato cub}, I'll consider it.

Wow! That is one dead mugato!

Perhaps I misjudged you, ! Can I stay with you? I could learn to fight like you do.

I only eat five times a day and my snores are actually soothing."Return to your father."

Bah! I don't want to go back. He never lets me do anything. "Clean this." "Cook this." "Stop hiding my weapons."

I just want to show him I'm a great hunter, too.

All right. Since you said so, I'll go back.

Come on. It's just a mugato cub. I thought you were this powerful hunter?

You shouldn't boast! Kaia will make your important parts fall off if you boast!

Shalim is incredibly stubborn. If he can learn discipline, he'll be a fine hunter.

In truth, I was no better when I was his age. I don't know how my father did it.

In any case, thank you for finding Shalim.
